list.name: Annotations & Alerts
list.rawQuery:
SELECT
    UNIX_TIMESTAMP(<time_column>) as time_sec,
    <text_column> as text,
    <tags_column> as tags
  FROM <table name>
  WHERE $__timeFilter(time_column)
  ORDER BY <time_column> ASC
  LIMIT 100

description:
This dashboard provides basic performance metrics for mysql/mariadb.

Uses Telegraf built-in plugin

targets.rawSql:
SELECT blocking_thread_id as blocker, requesting_thread_id as waiter
FROM performance_schema.data_LOCK_WAITS;

targets.query: select derivative(mean(connections), 1s) from "mysql" WHERE  "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(TIMEST) as time_sec,
  cast(variable_value as SIGNED) as value,
  variable_name as metric
FROM my2.status
WHERE $__timeFilter(TIMEST) AND variable_name in ('THREADS_CONNECTED')
ORDER BY time_sec ASC

targets.query: select mean(max_used_connections) from "mysql" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(<time_column>) as time_sec,
  <value column> as value,
  <series name column> as metric
FROM <table name>
WHERE $__timeFilter(time_column)
ORDER BY <time_column> ASC

targets.query: select mean("value") from "mysql_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'Threads_connected' AND "type" = 'gauge' AND "instance" = 'status' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(TIMEST) as time_sec,
  cast(variable_value as SIGNED) as value,
  variable_name as metric
FROM my2.status
WHERE $__timeFilter(TIMEST) AND variable_name in ('THREADS_RUNNING')
ORDER BY time_sec ASC

targets.query: select mean("value") from "mysql_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'Threads_running' AND "type" = 'gauge' AND "instance" = 'status' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

targets.query: SELECT last(value) FROM "mysql_value" WHERE "instance" = 'status' AND "type_instance" = 'Uptime' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(TIMEST) as time_sec,
  cast(variable_value as SIGNED) as value,
  variable_name as metric
FROM my2.status
WHERE $__timeFilter(TIMEST) AND variable_name = 'UPTIME'
ORDER BY time_sec ASC

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(<time_column>) as time_sec,
  <value column> as value,
  <series name column> as metric
FROM <table name>
WHERE $__timeFilter(time_column)
ORDER BY <time_column> ASC

targets.query: SELECT last(value) FROM "mysql_value" WHERE "instance" = 'status' AND "type" = 'counter' AND  "type_instance" = 'Queries' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)

select derivative(mean("value"),1s)*8 from "mysql_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'Bytes_sent' AND "type" = 'counter' AND "instance" = 'status' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(TIMEST) as time_sec,
  sum(cast(variable_value as SIGNED)/10) as value,
  "CONNECTION_ERRORS_xxx" as metric
FROM my2.status
WHERE $__timeFilter(TIMEST) AND variable_name in ('CONNECTION_ERRORS_ACCEPT-d','CONNECTION_ERRORS_INTERNAL-d','CONNECTION_ERRORS_MAX_CONNECTIONS-d','CONNECTION_ERRORS_PEER_ADDRESS-d','CONNECTION_ERRORS_SELECT-d','CONNECTION_ERRORS_TCPWRAP-d')
ORDER BY time_sec ASC

targets.query: SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_received"), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(TIMEST) as time_sec,

  variable_name as metric
FROM my2.status
WHERE $__timeFilter(TIMEST) AND variable_name in ('COM_INSERT_SELECT-d','COM_REPLACE_SELECT-d','COM_SELECT-d','CONNECTION_ERRORS_SELECT-d','SELECT_FULL_JOIN-d','SELECT_FULL_RANGE_JOIN-d','SELECT_RANGE-d','SELECT_RANGE_CHECK-d','SELECT_SCAN-d')
ORDER BY time_sec ASC

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(TIMEST) as time_sec,
  cast(variable_value as SIGNED)/600 as value,
  variable_name as metric
FROM my2.status
WHERE $__timeFilter(TIMEST) AND variable_name in ('HANDLER_COMMIT-d','HANDLER_DELETE-d','HANDLER_DISCOVER-d','HANDLER_EXTERNAL_LOCK-d','HANDLER_MRR_INIT-d','HANDLER_PREPARE-d','HANDLER_READ_FIRST-d','HANDLER_READ_KEY-d','HANDLER_READ_LAST-d','HANDLER_READ_NEXT-d','HANDLER_READ_PREV-d','HANDLER_READ_RND-d','HANDLER_READ_RND_NEXT-d','HANDLER_ROLLBACK-d','HANDLER_SAVEPOINT-d','HANDLER_SAVEPOINT_ROLLBACK-d','HANDLER_UPDATE-d','HANDLER_WRITE-d')
ORDER BY time_sec ASC

targets.rawSql:

  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(<time_column>) as time_sec,
  <value column> as value,
  <series name column> as metric

ORDER BY <time_column> ASC

targets.query: select mean("value") from "mysql_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'query_cache_size' AND "type" = 'gauge' AND "instance" = 'variables' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(x.TIMEST) as time_sec,
  cast(x.variable_value as SIGNED)/cast(y.variable_value as SIGNED)*100 as value,
  'Free Buffer%' as metric
FROM my2.status x, my2.status y
WHERE $__timeFilter(x.TIMEST) 
AND x.variable_name = 'INNODB_BUFFER_POOL_PAGES_FREE' 
AND y.variable_name = 'INNODB_BUFFER_POOL_PAGES_TOTAL'
AND x.TIMEST = Y.TIMEST
ORDER BY time_sec ASC

select derivative(mean("value"),1s) from "mysql_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'Opened_files' AND "type" = 'counter' AND "instance" = 'status' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(TIMEST) as time_sec,
  cast(variable_value as SIGNED) as value,
  variable_name as metric
FROM my2.status
WHERE $__timeFilter(TIMEST) AND variable_name = 'OPEN_FILES-d'
ORDER BY time_sec ASC
